title: When Everything Feels Broken
subtitle: A companion for rock bottom moments
description: For when life has fallen apart and you don't know how to go on. Not about fixing anything—just surviving the unsurvivable.

modules.title: One Day at a Time (Or Less)

questions.question: When life has fallen apart, the first goal is:
What does 'meaning' look like in crisis?
options: A grand purpose that explains everything
Small anchors—a person, a pet, a reason to get up
There is no meaning in crisis
